professional.title: Professional Web
features: Unique design adapted to your brand

revision.question: What is a revision round?
revision.answer: Each round allows modifications of texts, images, colors, and design adjustments. It does not include complete structure changes or additional functionalities not initially agreed upon.

maintenance.question: What does basic maintenance include?
maintenance.answer: Includes content updates (2-3 changes per month), text and image changes, contact information updates, bug fixes, and dependency security updates.

additional.question: Can I add additional functionalities?
additional.answer: Yes, the development of new functionalities is quoted separately according to the complexity of the requirement.
